page.title: 09HOUSING AROUND AUDENSHAW (1)
page.content: Audenshaw is very much a suburban area and its development of housing dates from the early 1930's; with two industrial estates bordering the area. There are many{detached}and {semi-detached}houses with gardens. Large bay windowed{terraced}houses are found on the main Ashton to Denton road - most of which have back gardens. Two new housing developments cater for{detached}and{semi-detached modern homes. The 1930's bay windowed houses were not built with garages, they have small kitchens and large gardens which is somewhat opposite to the building trends of 1985. There is a council house estate of {semi-detached}houses, each has its own garden.
